name: freeze
body: let cpi_accounts = SetAuthority { account_or_mint : ctx . accounts . token . to_account_info () , current_authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
anchor_spl :: token :: set_authority (cpi , Some (new_authority) , AuthorityType :: FreezeAccount ,) ? ;
emit ! (AccountFrozen { by : ctx . accounts . auth . key () }) ;

name: unfreeze
body: let cpi_accounts = SetAuthority { account_or_mint : ctx . accounts . token . to_account_info () , current_authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
anchor_spl :: token :: set_authority (cpi , None , AuthorityType :: FreezeAccount ,) ? ;
emit ! (AccountUnfrozen { by : ctx . accounts . auth . key () }) ;
